message: Let's be fair, Bob.  This gives me a slight advantage, but we both benefit from a quick resolution.
Alice, your offer was a bit too one-sided. Let's be more realistic. This offer still gives you a slight advantage, but time is money - literally!
Bob, this is a better offer than last round for both of us, considering the inflation. Let's settle this now before we both lose out more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day. Any more delays and we'll both be worse off.
